title: Apply the Integral of a Difference Property
text: For subtraction, $$\int_{a}^{b} f(x)-g(x) \,dx=\int_{a}^{b} f(x) \,dx-int{g(x),a,b,x}$$. This means separating the terms into three different integrals with the appropriate sign.
